explanation: [0-0] By the riverbank, a child wearing a gray top and brown pants balances a bucket of water on their head. A man in a blue hat and white clothes walks behind the child, holding a knife.
[0-5] The man approaches the child from behind and pierces the bucket with the knife, then catches the leaking water with his hand and drinks it.
